sponsor: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)
briefTitle: Treatment of Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease in Children (TONIC)
officialTitle: Clinical Research Network in Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis: Treatment of Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease in Children (TONIC)
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if therapeutic modification of insulin resistance or oxidative stress leads to improvement in serum or histologic indicators of liver injury or quality of life.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Sustained Reduction in Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT) to Either 50% of Baseline Value or < 40 IU/L
